html:
Parameter

Functionality

Width

Width of the form in percentage relative to the element width.

Align

How to align the form.

Layout

How to arrange the form fields. Available values:

  • horizontal
  • vertical
  • grid

Font family

Font type.

Font weight

Whether to use regular or bold font.

Font size

How large the form text is.
